issue.title: [CF 1558] Siphon Life Debuff Issue
issue.body:
As the title says. I chose the talent Siphon Life and the icon won't show when I place it on a target as Corruption/Unstable Affliction do etc. even though they're all in the same group.


Fixed it- "Who to watch" was on Player not Target. my bad


> Posted by CurseForge user BanalityPanda | Imported from CurseForge issue #1558 | Raw
